name: InterStellar (LightIceGames)
description:
Controls

Space: To Shoot

Arrows: To Move

Right Shift: To Start Game

Have Some fun!!!

I made this game for my dad because I wanted to take a break from making my other bigger project that is in the works. I knew he used play games like Galaga when he was younger, so that's what the gameplay of this game is supposed to root from. Making this was actually quite fun and Im also really excited to finally be able to get one of my game out there. Its obviously not the best game and I didn't want to spend too much time on it. Although I think it's still a playable game that some may get somewhat into.
